text: Abeysinghe Arachchilage Wijethunga (born 16 November 1957) is a Sri Lankan politician. He is a Member of the Parliament of Sri Lanka and former member of the Sabaragamuwa Provincial Council, Ratnapura District UNP Organizer and chief Organizer Kalawana. ==References== Category:Living people Category:United National Party politicians Category:1957 births Category:Members of the 12th Parliament of Sri Lanka Category:Members of the 15th Parliament of Sri Lanka Category:Provincial councillors of Sri Lanka Category:Members of the Sabaragamuwa Provincial Council
title: A. A. Wijethunga
